Update Collections

You're able to create new and edit existing collections here.

Warning: be VERY careful who you give access to this page. We strongly recommend you only provide access to Administrators of your website. By default, this pages' content is wrapped with a conditional that only allows Super Admins to access.

About This Page

The "Update Collections" page displays all current collections for the site.

It makes use of the following tags:

  • Favorites:Collections filtered by type (entry/member), to display a list of all the currently available Favorites collections for the site.
  • Favorites:Collection_Form to display a form to allow admins to add or update existing Favorites collections.

The global sidebar on the right makes use of the following tags:

  • Favorites:Collections filtered by type (entry/member), to display a list of all the currently available Favorites collections for the site.
  • Favorites:Entries to display the saved favorited entries of the currently logged in user.
  • Favorites:Members to display the saved favorited members of the currently logged in user.
